3.5 Threads: the Threads structure

on

Function

Summary

Returns true if the threads that make up MLWorks are being interleaved via regular pre-emptions.

Signature

MLWORKS.Threads.Internal.Preemption

Structure

MLWorks.Threads.Internal.Preemption

Type

val on : unit -> bool

Syntax

on () -> on?

Arguments

()

Values

on?
A boolean value.

Description

Returns true if the threads that make up MLWorks are being interleaved via regular pre-emptions.
